onboarding.title: Make Payment
onboarding.text: Securely complete your purchase using Stripe. We support all major payment methods to ensure a smooth and safe checkout.

onboarding.title: Choose Products
onboarding.text: Select the items that best match your interests. This will help us personalize your experience

onboarding.title: Unlock Gifts & Discounts
onboarding.text: Enjoy exclusive offers, discounts, and surprise gifts just for you. Start saving as you shop!
